properties.areaDesc: Waters from Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet out 20 to 40 nm; Waters from Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY from 20 to 40 NM; Waters from Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY from 20 to 40 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 6:33PM EST until February 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts
up to 50 kt and seas 14 to 19 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 8 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Moriches Inlet to Montauk Point NY from 20
to 40 nm, Waters from Fire Island Inlet to Moriches Inlet NY
from 20 to 40 nm and Waters from Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island
Inlet NY from 20 to 40 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 7 AM EST Saturday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY
